controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.1
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.1
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.1.a authorized users are identified.

AC.3.1.1.b processes acting on behalf of authorized users are identified.

AC.3.1.1.c devices (and other systems) authorized to connect to the system are identified.

AC.3.1.1.d system access is limited to authorized users.

AC.3.1.1.e system access is limited to processes acting on behalf of authorized users.

AC.3.1.1.f system access is limited to authorized devices (including other systems).

objectives.prose: authorized users are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.1[a]

objectives.prose: processes acting on behalf of authorized users are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.1[b]

objectives.prose: devices (and other systems) authorized to connect to the system are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.1[c]

objectives.prose: system access is limited to authorized users.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.1[d]

objectives.prose: system access is limited to processes acting on behalf of authorized users.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.1[e]

objectives.prose: system access is limited to authorized devices (including other systems).
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.1[f]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.2
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.2
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.2.a the types of transactions and functions that authorized users are permitted to execute are defined.

AC.3.1.2.b system access is limited to the defined types of transactions and functions for authorized users.

objectives.prose: the types of transactions and functions that authorized users are permitted to execute are defined.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.2[a]

objectives.prose: system access is limited to the defined types of transactions and functions for authorized users.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.2[b]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.3
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.3
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.3.a information flow control policies are defined.

AC.3.1.3.b methods and enforcement mechanisms for controlling the flow of CUI are defined.

AC.3.1.3.c designated sources and destinations (e.g., networks, individuals, and devices) for CUI within the system and between interconnected systems are identified.

AC.3.1.3.d authorizations for controlling the flow of CUI are defined.

AC.3.1.3.e approved authorizations for controlling the flow of CUI are enforced.

objectives.prose: information flow control policies are defined.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.3[a]

objectives.prose: methods and enforcement mechanisms for controlling the flow of CUI are defined.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.3[b]

objectives.prose: designated sources and destinations (e.g., networks, individuals, and devices) for CUI within the system and between interconnected systems are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.3[c]

objectives.prose: authorizations for controlling the flow of CUI are defined.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.3[d]

objectives.prose: approved authorizations for controlling the flow of CUI are enforced.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.3[e]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.4
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.4
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.4.a the duties of individuals requiring separation are defined.

AC.3.1.4.b responsibilities for duties that require separation are assigned to separate individuals.

AC.3.1.4.c access privileges that enable individuals to exercise the duties that require separation are granted to separate individuals.

objectives.prose: the duties of individuals requiring separation are defined.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.4[a]

objectives.prose: responsibilities for duties that require separation are assigned to separate individuals.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.4[b]

objectives.prose: access privileges that enable individuals to exercise the duties that require separation are granted to separate individuals.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.4[c]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.5
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.5
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.5.a privileged accounts are identified.

AC.3.1.5.b access to privileged accounts is authorized in accordance with the principle of least privilege.

AC.3.1.5.c security functions are identified.

AC.3.1.5.d access to security functions is authorized in accordance with the principle of least privilege.

objectives.prose: privileged accounts are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.5[a]

objectives.prose: access to privileged accounts is authorized in accordance with the principle of least privilege.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.5[b]

objectives.prose: security functions are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.5[c]

objectives.prose: access to security functions is authorized in accordance with the principle of least privilege.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.5[d]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.6
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.6
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.6.a nonsecurity functions are identified.

AC.3.1.6.b users are required to use non-privileged accounts or roles when accessing nonsecurity functions.

objectives.prose: nonsecurity functions are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.6[a]

objectives.prose: users are required to use non-privileged accounts or roles when accessing nonsecurity functions.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.6[b]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.7
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.7
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.7.a privileged functions are defined.

AC.3.1.7.b non-privileged users are defined.

AC.3.1.7.c non-privileged users are prevented from executing privileged functions.

AC.3.1.7.d the execution of privileged functions is captured in event logs.

objectives.prose: privileged functions are defined.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.7[a]

objectives.prose: non-privileged users are defined.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.7[b]

objectives.prose: non-privileged users are prevented from executing privileged functions.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.7[c]

objectives.prose: the execution of privileged functions is captured in event logs.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.7[d]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.8
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.8
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.8.a the means of limiting unsuccessful logon attempts is defined.

AC.3.1.8.b the defined means of limiting unsuccessful logon attempts is implemented.

objectives.prose: the means of limiting unsuccessful logon attempts is defined.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.8[a]

objectives.prose: the defined means of limiting unsuccessful logon attempts is implemented.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.8[b]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.9
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.9
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.9.a privacy and security notices required by CUI-specified rules are identified, consistent, and associated with the specific CUI category.

AC.3.1.9.b privacy and security notices are displayed.

objectives.prose: privacy and security notices required by CUI-specified rules are identified, consistent, and associated with the specific CUI category.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.9[a]

objectives.prose: privacy and security notices are displayed.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.9[b]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.10
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.10
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.10.a the period of inactivity after which the system initiates a session lock is defined.

AC.3.1.10.b access to the system and viewing of data is prevented by initiating a session lock after the defined period of inactivity.

AC.3.1.10.c previously visible information is concealed via a pattern-hiding display after the defined period of inactivity.

objectives.prose: the period of inactivity after which the system initiates a session lock is defined.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.10[a]

objectives.prose: access to the system and viewing of data is prevented by initiating a session lock after the defined period of inactivity.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.10[b]

objectives.prose: previously visible information is concealed via a pattern-hiding display after the defined period of inactivity.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.10[c]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.11
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.11
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.11.a conditions requiring a user session to terminate are defined.

AC.3.1.11.b a user session is automatically terminated after any of the defined conditions occur.

objectives.prose: conditions requiring a user session to terminate are defined.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.11[a]

objectives.prose: a user session is automatically terminated after any of the defined conditions occur.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.11[b]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.12
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.12
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.12.a remote access sessions are permitted.

AC.3.1.12.b the types of permitted remote access are identified.

AC.3.1.12.c remote access sessions are controlled.

AC.3.1.12.d remote access sessions are monitored.

objectives.prose: remote access sessions are permitted.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.12[a]

objectives.prose: the types of permitted remote access are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.12[b]

objectives.prose: remote access sessions are controlled.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.12[c]

objectives.prose: remote access sessions are monitored.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.12[d]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.13
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.13
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.13.a cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality of remote access sessions are identified.

AC.3.1.13.b cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality of remote access sessions are implemented.

objectives.prose: cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality of remote access sessions are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.13[a]

objectives.prose: cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality of remote access sessions are implemented.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.13[b]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.14
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.14
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.14.a managed access control points are identified and implemented.

AC.3.1.14.b remote access is routed through managed network access control points.

objectives.prose: managed access control points are identified and implemented.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.14[a]

objectives.prose: remote access is routed through managed network access control points.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.14[b]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.15
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.15
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.15.a privileged commands authorized for remote execution are identified.

AC.3.1.15.b security-relevant information authorized to be accessed remotely is identified.

AC.3.1.15.c the execution of the identified privileged commands via remote access is authorized.

AC.3.1.15.d access to the identified security-relevant information via remote access is authorized.

objectives.prose: privileged commands authorized for remote execution are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.15[a]

objectives.prose: security-relevant information authorized to be accessed remotely is identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.15[b]

objectives.prose: the execution of the identified privileged commands via remote access is authorized.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.15[c]

objectives.prose: access to the identified security-relevant information via remote access is authorized.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.15[d]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.16
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.16
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.16.a wireless access points are identified.

AC.3.1.16.b wireless access is authorized prior to allowing such connections.

objectives.prose: wireless access points are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.16[a]

objectives.prose: wireless access is authorized prior to allowing such connections.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.16[b]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.17
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.17
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.17.a wireless access to the system is protected using authentication.

AC.3.1.17.b wireless access to the system is protected using encryption.

objectives.prose: wireless access to the system is protected using authentication.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.17[a]

objectives.prose: wireless access to the system is protected using encryption.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.17[b]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.18
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.18
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.18.a mobile devices that process, store, or transmit CUI are identified.

AC.3.1.18.b mobile device connections are authorized

AC.3.1.18.c mobile device connections are monitored and logged.

objectives.prose: mobile devices that process, store, or transmit CUI are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.18[a]

objectives.prose: mobile device connections are authorized
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.18[b]

objectives.prose: mobile device connections are monitored and logged.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.18[c]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.19
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.19
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.19.a mobile devices and mobile computing platforms that process, store, or transmit CUI are identified.

AC.3.1.19.b encryption is employed to protect CUI on identified mobile devices and mobile computing platforms.

objectives.prose: mobile devices and mobile computing platforms that process, store, or transmit CUI are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.19[a]

objectives.prose: encryption is employed to protect CUI on identified mobile devices and mobile computing platforms.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.19[b]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.20
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.20
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.20.a connections to external systems are identified.

AC.3.1.20.b the use of external systems is identified.

AC.3.1.20.c connections to external systems are verified.

AC.3.1.20.d the use of external systems is verified.

AC.3.1.20.e connections to external systems are controlled/limited.

AC.3.1.20.f the use of external systems is controlled/limited.

objectives.prose: connections to external systems are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.20[a]

objectives.prose: the use of external systems is identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.20[b]

objectives.prose: connections to external systems are verified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.20[c]

objectives.prose: the use of external systems is verified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.20[d]

objectives.prose: connections to external systems are controlled/limited.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.20[e]

objectives.prose: the use of external systems is controlled/limited.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.20[f]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.21
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.21
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.21.a the use of portable storage devices containing CUI on external systems is identified and documented.

AC.3.1.21.b limits on the use of portable storage devices containing CUI on external systems are defined.

AC.3.1.21.c the use of portable storage devices containing CUI on external systems is limited as defined.

objectives.prose: the use of portable storage devices containing CUI on external systems is identified and documented.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.21[a]

objectives.prose: limits on the use of portable storage devices containing CUI on external systems are defined.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.21[b]

objectives.prose: the use of portable storage devices containing CUI on external systems is limited as defined.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.21[c]

controls.title: Control 03.01.3.1.22
controls.label: AC.L2-3.1.22
controls.statement:
AC.3.1.22.a individuals authorized to post or process information on publicly accessible systems are identified.

AC.3.1.22.b procedures to ensure CUI is not posted or processed on publicly accessible systems are identified.

AC.3.1.22.c a review process is in place prior to posting of any content to publicly accessible systems.

AC.3.1.22.d content on publicly accessible systems is reviewed to ensure that it does not include CUI.

AC.3.1.22.e mechanisms are in place to remove and address improper posting of CUI.

objectives.prose: individuals authorized to post or process information on publicly accessible systems are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.22[a]

objectives.prose: procedures to ensure CUI is not posted or processed on publicly accessible systems are identified.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.22[b]

objectives.prose: a review process is in place prior to posting of any content to publicly accessible systems.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.22[c]

objectives.prose: content on publicly accessible systems is reviewed to ensure that it does not include CUI.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.22[d]

objectives.prose: mechanisms are in place to remove and address improper posting of CUI.
objectives.label: AC.L2-3.1.22[e]

controls.title: Control 03.02.3.2.1
controls.label: AT.L2-3.2.1
controls.statement:
AT.3.2.1.a security risks associated with organizational activities involving CUI are identified.

AT.3.2.1.b policies, standards, and procedures related to the security of the system are identified.

AT.3.2.1.c managers, systems administrators, and users of the system are made aware of the security risks associated with their activities.

AT.3.2.1.d managers, systems administrators, and users of the system are made aware of the applicable policies, standards and procedures related to the security of the system.

objectives.prose: security risks associated with organizational activities involving CUI are identified.
objectives.label: AT.L2-3.2.1[a]

objectives.prose: policies, standards, and procedures related to the security of the system are identified.
objectives.label: AT.L2-3.2.1[b]

objectives.prose: managers, systems administrators, and users of the system are made aware of the security risks associated with their activities.
objectives.label: AT.L2-3.2.1[c]

objectives.prose: managers, systems administrators, and users of the system are made aware of the applicable policies, standards and procedures related to the security of the system.
objectives.label: AT.L2-3.2.1[d]

controls.title: Control 03.02.3.2.2
controls.label: AT.L2-3.2.2
controls.statement:
AT.3.2.2.a information security-related duties, roles, and responsibilities are defined.

AT.3.2.2.b information security-related duties, roles, and responsibilities are assigned to designated personnel.

AT.3.2.2.c personnel are adequately trained to carry out their assigned information security-related duties, roles, and responsibilities.

objectives.prose: information security-related duties, roles, and responsibilities are defined.
objectives.label: AT.L2-3.2.2[a]

objectives.prose: information security-related duties, roles, and responsibilities are assigned to designated personnel.
objectives.label: AT.L2-3.2.2[b]

objectives.prose: personnel are adequately trained to carry out their assigned information security-related duties, roles, and responsibilities.
objectives.label: AT.L2-3.2.2[c]

controls.title: Control 03.02.3.2.3
controls.label: AT.L2-3.2.3
controls.statement:
AT.3.2.3.a potential indicators associated with insider threats are identified.

AT.3.2.3.b security awareness training on recognizing and reporting potential indicators of insider threat is provided to managers and employees.

objectives.prose: potential indicators associated with insider threats are identified.
objectives.label: AT.L2-3.2.3[a]

objectives.prose: security awareness training on recognizing and reporting potential indicators of insider threat is provided to managers and employees.
objectives.label: AT.L2-3.2.3[b]

controls.title: Control 03.03.3.3.1
controls.label: AU.L2-3.3.1
controls.statement:
AU.3.3.1.a audit logs needed (i.e., event types to be logged) to enable the monitoring, analysis, investigation, and reporting of unlawful or unauthorized system activity are specified.

AU.3.3.1.b the content of audit records needed to support monitoring, analysis, investigation, and reporting of unlawful or unauthorized system activity is defined.

AU.3.3.1.c audit records are created (generated).

AU.3.3.1.d audit records, once created, contain the defined content.

AU.3.3.1.e retention requirements for audit records are defined.

AU.3.3.1.f audit records are retained as defined.

objectives.prose: audit logs needed (i.e., event types to be logged) to enable the monitoring, analysis, investigation, and reporting of unlawful or unauthorized system activity are specified.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.1[a]

objectives.prose: the content of audit records needed to support monitoring, analysis, investigation, and reporting of unlawful or unauthorized system activity is defined.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.1[b]

objectives.prose: audit records are created (generated).
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.1[c]

objectives.prose: audit records, once created, contain the defined content.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.1[d]

objectives.prose: retention requirements for audit records are defined.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.1[e]

objectives.prose: audit records are retained as defined.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.1[f]

controls.title: Control 03.03.3.3.2
controls.label: AU.L2-3.3.2
controls.statement:
AU.3.3.2.a the content of the audit records needed to support the ability to uniquely trace users to their actions is defined.

AU.3.3.2.b audit records, once created, contain the defined content.

objectives.prose: the content of the audit records needed to support the ability to uniquely trace users to their actions is defined.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.2[a]

objectives.prose: audit records, once created, contain the defined content.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.2[b]

controls.title: Control 03.03.3.3.3
controls.label: AU.L2-3.3.3
controls.statement:
AU.3.3.3.a a process for determining when to review logged events is defined.

AU.3.3.3.b event types being logged are reviewed in accordance with the defined review process.

AU.3.3.3.c event types being logged are updated based on the review.

objectives.prose: a process for determining when to review logged events is defined.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.3[a]

objectives.prose: event types being logged are reviewed in accordance with the defined review process.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.3[b]

objectives.prose: event types being logged are updated based on the review.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.3[c]

controls.title: Control 03.03.3.3.4
controls.label: AU.L2-3.3.4
controls.statement:
AU.3.3.4.a personnel or roles to be alerted in the event of an audit logging process failure are identified.

AU.3.3.4.b types of audit logging process failures for which alert will be generated are defined.

AU.3.3.4.c identified personnel or roles are alerted in the event of an audit logging process failure.

objectives.prose: personnel or roles to be alerted in the event of an audit logging process failure are identified.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.4[a]

objectives.prose: types of audit logging process failures for which alert will be generated are defined.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.4[b]

objectives.prose: identified personnel or roles are alerted in the event of an audit logging process failure.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.4[c]

controls.title: Control 03.03.3.3.5
controls.label: AU.L2-3.3.5
controls.statement:
AU.3.3.5.a audit record review, analysis, and reporting processes for investigation and response to indications of unlawful, unauthorized, suspicious, or unusual activity are defined.

AU.3.3.5.b defined audit record review, analysis, and reporting processes are correlated.

objectives.prose: audit record review, analysis, and reporting processes for investigation and response to indications of unlawful, unauthorized, suspicious, or unusual activity are defined.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.5[a]

objectives.prose: defined audit record review, analysis, and reporting processes are correlated.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.5[b]

controls.title: Control 03.03.3.3.6
controls.label: AU.L2-3.3.6
controls.statement:
AU.3.3.6.a an audit record reduction and report generation capability is provided that supports on-demand audit record review, analysis, and reporting requirements, and after-the-fact investigations of incidents that do not alter the original content or time ordering of audit records.

AU.3.3.6.b a report generation capability that supports on-demand reporting is provided.

objectives.prose: an audit record reduction and report generation capability is provided that supports on-demand audit record review, analysis, and reporting requirements, and after-the-fact investigations of incidents that do not alter the original content or time ordering of audit records.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.6[a]

objectives.prose: a report generation capability that supports on-demand reporting is provided.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.6[b]

controls.title: Control 03.03.3.3.7
controls.label: AU.L2-3.3.7
controls.statement:
AU.3.3.7.a internal system clocks are used to generate time stamps for audit records.

AU.3.3.7.b an authoritative source with which to compare and synchronize internal system clocks is specified.

AU.3.3.7.c internal system clocks used to generate time stamps for audit records are compared to and synchronized with the specified authoritative time source.

objectives.prose: internal system clocks are used to generate time stamps for audit records.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.7[a]

objectives.prose: an authoritative source with which to compare and synchronize internal system clocks is specified.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.7[b]

objectives.prose: internal system clocks used to generate time stamps for audit records are compared to and synchronized with the specified authoritative time source.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.7[c]

controls.title: Control 03.03.3.3.8
controls.label: AU.L2-3.3.8
controls.statement:
AU.3.3.8.a audit information is protected from unauthorized access.

AU.3.3.8.b audit information is protected from unauthorized modification.

AU.3.3.8.c audit information is protected from unauthorized deletion.

AU.3.3.8.d audit logging tools are protected from unauthorized access.

AU.3.3.8.e audit logging tools are protected from unauthorized modification.

AU.3.3.8.f audit logging tools are protected from unauthorized deletion.

objectives.prose: audit information is protected from unauthorized access.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.8[a]

objectives.prose: audit information is protected from unauthorized modification.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.8[b]

objectives.prose: audit information is protected from unauthorized deletion.
objectives.label: AU.L2-3.3.8[c]

objectives.prose: audit logging tools are protected from unauthorized access.
